column4: Hi Guys. I'm trying to get mail working on my new server, and while I can send mail out, I can't receive it. I was wondering if someone can hold my hand a bit
If I try telnet localhost 25 locally, I get a response, but when I try telnet <ip> 25 externally, I can't connect
I'm using linode, which is a vps provider
Okay, then you would basically need to make sure that Port 25 is being listened to on all addresses, and not just localhost.
sounds good. Care to guide me through that? ;-)
if you do a netstat -nat, and look for port 25, and it shows 127.0.0.1::25, then you need to have it bind to all addresses, which is done through 0.0.0.0::25
Alright, that means that sendmail is only listening to loopback, EG: 127.0.0.1
hmm. do you know how to change that?
Sec, gotta look it up.  Been a while since I messed with sendmail for SMTP/POP
